edited_stories.edited_story_text: The parade was spectacular! There were so many costumes. Each one, more varied than the last, and the amounts of creativity put into them were amazing. I had such a great time, especially when the winner was announced, which they deserved it by how cool their costume was.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: I went to the parade, which was a lot of fun. In this first photo you can see this interesting group of artifacts - I purchased one. In this second photo you can see all the different costumes used, which were very creative and colorful. You can see the winner of a parade costume party in the fourth photo. I thought his costume was very cool. Overall, I had a jolly good time.
